# UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.detailDisclosureButton

**Case**

An information button and a disclosure (chevron) control.

## Declaration

```swift
case detailDisclosureButton
```

## Discussion

Choose this type when you want both an information button and a disclosure control. Connect the disclosure control to a push segue to display new content. Use the delegate’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewDelegate/tableView(_:accessoryButtonTappedForRowWith:)]method to respond to touch events in the detail button.

## Accessory views

- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.none**: No accessory view.
- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.disclosureIndicator**: A chevron-shaped control for presenting new content.
- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.checkmark**: A checkmark image.
- **UITableViewCell.AccessoryType.detailButton**: An information button.
